attributes.action: Help secure Jobs for Teenagers who finish education at the age of 16.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I finished my education at the age of 16 after completing my GCSE's in June of 2008. To set out into the world and find a job to help my family pay the bills. But to all my efforts I am still unable to find anyone who wants to recruit me. 

I am doing this petition so that the PM will help young people like myself and many others who will or have left school at the age of 16 to get a job. I feel that there is no valid scheme made by the goverment to help young people who leave school at 16 to get into a job.
